    Quickly fuzzy find classes, mixins, methods, file:

    • Ctrl-T Open fuzzy finder dialog

    In frame mode you can toggle the list naviation frame on the left side:

    • Ctrl-L Toggle list view

    You can focus a list in frame mode or toggle a tab in frameless mode:

    • Ctrl-C Class list
    • Ctrl-I Mixin list
    • Ctrl-F File list
    • Ctrl-M Method list
    • Ctrl-E Extras list

    You can focus and blur the search input:

    • Ctrl-S Focus search input
    • Esc Blur search input

    In frameless mode you can close the list tab:

    • Esc Close list tab

    File: jQuery.coffee

    Defined in: adapters

    Constant Summary

    DATA_NAME =

    Data key to use for storing a reference to the chart instance on an element.

    'epoch-chart'

    Method Summary

    • ? (Object) jQuery.fn.epoch(options) Adds an Epoch chart of the given type to the referenced element.

    Method Details

    ? (Object) jQuery.fn.epoch(options)

    Adds an Epoch chart of the given type to the referenced element.

    Parameters:

    • options (Object) — Options for the chart.

    Options Hash: (option):

    • type (String) — The type of chart to append to the referenced element.

    Returns:

    • (Object) — The chart instance that was associated with the containing element.
